name: Echoes In The Dark (Cilmering)
description:
A pervasive darkness has settled over a once rich land. The presence of a Heart of Corruption has cursed every explorer into permanent solitude, allowing them to leave signs of their presence, but never see another human. The explorers must now work together to blaze a path to the Heart of Corruption at the center of the darkness, and cleanse the land once and for all.

Game made by Sebastian Bolatto, aka "Cilmering."
